name: Burgundy
startIntroPart1: From the splendour of the Dukes of Burgundy to the fertile lands of this illustrious region, the Burgundians rose to build a grandiose future.
startIntroPart2: Fertile lands and skilful diplomatic ties are the hallmarks of the Burgundians, a civilisation that seeks to flourish through culture and alliances in the complex world of Unciv.
declaringWar: With determination and pride in our Burgundian roots, we are forced to declare war to protect our interests and preserve our sovereignty.
attacked: We regret that the diplomatic route did not prevail, but we will resolutely defend our land and our people.
defeated: The Burgundians, though defeated, still proudly bear the burden of their history and will seek to rise like a phoenix from the ashes.
introduction: Greetings, potential friends. The people of Burgundy are reaching out in a spirit of cooperation and mutual exchange. May we establish fruitful relations for the good of our peoples.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Culture] [in all cities] <starting from the [Medieval era]> <before the [Industrial era]>

name: Flanders
startIntroPart1: From rich fertile plains to flourishing ports, Flanders emerges as a cultural and economic crossroads at the heart of Unciv. Immerse yourself in an era of artistic and commercial prosperity, where every work of art and every diplomatic agreement shapes your heritage.
startIntroPart2: From thriving trading cities to artistic masterpieces that light up the horizon, Flanders opens the doors to an era of cultural brilliance. As a centre of trade and crafts, you have the chance to shape an unforgettable civilisation in the world of Unciv.
declaringWar: For Flanders and its greatness, we are writing our destiny through conquest and perseverance.
attacked: Our swords are raised, our honour is at stake. Flanders defends its soil with pride and determination.
defeated: Despite our valiant fight, defeat is a bitter pill to swallow, but we will learn from our mistakes and grow stronger.
introduction: Greetings, potential friends. The people of Flanders welcome you with an open mind and mutual interest.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Together, we are sealing a lasting peace agreement, putting an end to the conflicts that have overshadowed our lands. May we move forward into an era of mutual cooperation and prosperity.
tradeRequest: I'm offering you a fruitful trade, where our riches will mingle in a profitable union for both of us.
uniques: [+2 Production, [+15]% Gold] [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Brittany
startIntroPart1: From the proud city of Nantes to the windswept coastline, the Duchy of Brittany emerges as a bastion of resilience and independence. Our tumultuous history and ancestral links with the sea will guide us towards a future shaped by diplomacy and the defence of our values.
declaringWar: The winds of history are blowing us into action. May our blades and banners rise up against you to defend our duchy and its heritage.
attacked: The noise of the waves does not drown out our determination. If you are looking for conflict, know that we will resist with the strength and spirit of Brittany.
defeated: The battle may be lost, but the sea continues to dance under the Breton sky. We retreat to reunite and bounce back, like foam on the shore.
introduction: Greetings, foreign people. The coasts of Brittany have welcomed many visitors over the centuries. May we share new horizons and new stories.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: We extend our open hand, accepting the end of hostilities. Let us hope that this treaty strengthens the peace between our lands.
tradeRequest: Let's propose a fair exchange, where our riches will intertwine like waves on the shore.
uniques: +1 culture [in all cities] Must be next to [Coast]

name: Nervii
startIntroPart1: From the shadows of the deep forests, the Nervians emerge as fearless warriors, ready to defend their ancestral homeland. Driven by an indomitable spirit, we are ready to forge our destiny with spear and shield.
declaringWar: The echoes of our ancestors resound within us. By the voice of the horn, we announce the battle, and let our enemies know of our fierce determination.
attacked: War is our heritage, but the forest is also home to wisdom. If you want battle, we'll respond with the strength of the Nervians.
defeated: Like the wind slipping through the leaves, our cause has been erased. We withdraw, not defeated, but ready to rise again.
introduction: Nature speaks through our veins, and the sound of the forest guides us. As Nerviens, we salute you, dear neighbour.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: We are temporarily laying down our arms, but you should know that the Nervian people never bend. May we find common ground in the shadows of the forest.
tradeRequest: Let's propose an exchange that mutually benefits our tribes. Our wealth and expertise will combine like the elements of nature.

name: Transvaal Republic
startIntroPart1: The vast expanses of the Transvaal, cradle of the Boer resistance, remind us of our history of struggle and determination in the face of foreign forces.
declaringWar: The sands of our homeland bear witness to our sacrifices, past and present. We will not shy away from the fight to protect our heritage.
attacked: We have learned not to fear the challenges of this arid world. If you're looking for confrontation, we're ready for it.
defeated: Our hearts remain attached to these lands, even in defeat. We will rise again, for the soul of the Transvaal cannot be broken.
introduction: Greetings, strangers. We are the people of the Transvaal, bound together by a history of resistance and determination.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Peace, like an oasis in the heart of the desert, is a beacon of hope. Let us hope that our history of conflict can give way to more peaceful times.
tradeRequest: The desert winds carry our words of trade. Accept this proposal for a partnership that can enrich our arid lands.
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Food] [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Natalia Republic
startIntroPart1: From the subtropical coast to the fertile hinterland, the Republic of Natalia was born in the fever of the gold rush and the struggle for land. Our history is woven into the waves of the Indian Ocean and the green hills.
declaringWar: The warm winds of our homeland carry the echo of our history of resistance. We are ready to defend our lands against any threat.
attacked: Past conflicts have forged our determination. If you choose the path of war, be prepared to face our determination.
defeated: Our deep roots in this tropical land remain unshakeable, even in defeat. We will rise again to continue shaping our destiny.
introduction: Greetings, strangers. As the Republic of Natalia, we are a people who draw our strength from the many facets of our region.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Peace is an oasis in the desert of war. May our differences be a springboard for more harmonious relations in the future.
tradeRequest: Our trade routes follow the paths of history. Accept this proposal for a trade alliance that can enrich our cultures.

name: Orange Republic
startIntroPart1: In the heart of the dry lands, the Republic of Orange has forged its destiny in the heat of conflict and aspirations for freedom. Our roots are anchored in the vast plains, where history has sculpted our dreams.
declaringWar: The desert winds echo our determination to protect our land and our independence. We are ready to defend what is ours.
attacked: The sands of the desert have forged our robust character. If you choose conflict, be prepared to face our resistance.
defeated: Even in defeat, our deep roots guide us. The Orange Republic will always rise to fight once again.
introduction: Greetings, travellers. The Republic of Orange emerges from arid lands, where history and determination have shaped our destiny.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Peace, like an oasis in the desert, offers respite. Let us hope that our paths can cross without future hostilities.
tradeRequest: Trade caravans make their way across the desert. Accept our offer of a trade agreement to benefit mutually from our resources.
uniques: [[+20]% Food] [in all cities connected to capital]
